panels.visual: Malrik examining observatory Finding evidence of break-in
panels.dialogue: Malrik: "Look. Scratches on the lock. Recent."

panels.visual: Prismor discovering hidden compartment Finding crimson emblem
panels.dialogue: Prismor: "This symbol... I saw it at the forge. On cloaked figures."

panels.visual: Lunara communing with plants in garden Plants showing her visions
panels.dialogue: Lunara: "The plants remember... a noble. Stealing frozen iron in the night."

panels.visual: Val talking to frightened halfling courier
panels.dialogue: Courier: "I saw them! Drow and a human noble! Going down to the deep sanctum!" Val: "The Elven Sanctum? But that's forbidden!"
panels.location: Courier Guild Headquarters - small stone office/meeting room in Everpeak Citadel. Chalk route maps on walls showing tunnel networks. Simple wooden desks and benches. Couriers coming and going. Dispatch boards with delivery assignments. Medieval fantasy guild hall. Winter cloaks hanging on pegs. Practical working space.
